_header: Though I be bound yet am I free
_description: An enigma: the bond of love — six quatrains

BLHar2252.First Lines:
Thowghe I Be Bonde yette am I freeThowghe I be free yet am I
                    Tyed…
BLHar2252.Last Lines:
…I do my beste Bothe nyghte & dayBut bonde & free
                    Still am I steyed
BLHar2252.Editions:
Flügel,  Ewald,
                        ed.  
             Neuenglisches Lesebuch.
         1 Bd. Halle: Niemayer, 1895: 139.
